content.text: Hi! I'm an older gentleman who loves to travel. I'm married and my favorite book is the Bible.
Hi! I'm a soccer player who loves pizza. My idol is Thierry Henry and I went to Stanford. I'm married with a 4 year old son.
That's great! What do you like about pizza?
I love the taste and the variety. There are so many different toppings and styles to choose from.
I agree! Pizza is one of my favorite foods too. I love to try different kinds of pizza from all over the world.
That's awesome! I've been lucky enough to travel a lot and I've had some amazing pizza experiences.
Me too! I've had some amazing pizza in Italy, Spain, and Mexico.
Those are some of my favorite places to get pizza! I love the traditional pizza in Italy and the Mexican pizza in Mexico.
I agree! Those are both amazing. I also love the pizza in Spain. It's so different from what you get in the United States.
I've never had pizza in Spain, but I'm going to have to try it now!
You won't be disappointed! It's amazing.
Well, I'm glad we have something in common! I love pizza and I love traveling.
Me too! It's always a great experience.
